text: The 1978 Grand Prix d'Automne was the 72nd edition of the Paris–Tours cycle race and was held on 1 October 1978. The race started in Blois and finished in Montlhéry. The race was won by Jan Raas. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 36" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 36" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 36" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 36" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 36" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 36" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 59" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 59" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 59" |} |} ==References== Category:1978 in French sport 1978 Category:1978 Super Prestige Pernod
